Uses of Package
evs.metric.metrics

Packages that use evs.metric.metrics
evs.analysisunits Store of classes for specifying Verification Units (VUs) and Aggregation Units (AUs). 
evs.gui.utilities Utility classes for the Graphical User Interface (GUI). 
evs.gui.windows Windows in the GUI. 
evs.metric.metrics Verification metrics for the ensemble mean and (ensemble-derived) forecast probabilities. 
evs.metric.results Storage of results from the verification metrics. 
 

Classes in evs.metric.metrics used by evs.analysisunits
Metric
          An abstract base class for verification metrics.
 

Classes in evs.metric.metrics used by evs.gui.utilities
Metric
          An abstract base class for verification metrics.
 

Classes in evs.metric.metrics used by evs.gui.windows
Metric
          An abstract base class for verification metrics.
 

Classes in evs.metric.metrics used by evs.metric.metrics
BootstrapableMetric
          Identifies a metric that may be bootstrapped, in order to assess its uncertainty when computed from a limited sample of verification pairs.
BrierScore
          The Brier score is the mean squared error of a dichotomous forecast event in probability space.
CategoricalMetric
          Identifies an ensemble or probabilistic metric that is defined only for discrete events, such as the exceedence or non-exceedence of some threshold.
DecomposableScore
          Identifies a metric that may be decomposed into constituent parts, such as reliability, resolution and uncertainty.
DiagramMetric
          An abstract base class for a metric that comprises a diagram.
EnsembleMetric
          An interface identifying an ensemble verification metric.
MeanContRankProbScore
          The Continuous Ranked Probability Score (CRPS) is the integrated squared difference between the cumulative distributions of the forecasts and the observations, where the cdf of the observations is given by the Heaviside function (pdf is the dirac delta function).
Metric
          An abstract base class for verification metrics.
MetricCalculationException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an error calculating a metric.
ModifiedBoxPlot
          Constructs a modified box-and-whisker plot with a set of thresholds.
RawMetric
          An abstract base class for a metric that shows the raw verification data, rather than computing a score or showing a specific attribute of forecast quality.
ScoreMetric
          An abstract base class for metrics that represents an integrated score.
SingleValuedMetric
          An interface identifying a single-valued forecast verification metric.
SkillScore
          An interface that identifies a skill metric.
ThresholdMetric
          An interface that denotes a metric with one or more thresholds.
 

Classes in evs.metric.metrics used by evs.metric.results
MetricCalculationException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an error calculating a metric.
